summary: I HAVE A 1999 CHEV MALIBU AND YES THE INTAKE MANIFOLD IS FAILING. I HAVE HAD THIS REPLACED BY THE DEALER TWICE. GM APPARENTLY KNOWS ABOUT THIS PROBLEM FOR USING SHOTTY PARTS AND THEY REFUSE TO STEP UP AND FIX IT. I AM FORMALLY COMPLAINING TO THE BBB GM ITSELF AND ANYONE ELSE I CAN THINK OF.     GM CHEVY STANDS FOR JUNK
